transcript:
... a letter," she announced in gleeful triumph. 
"Nicholas!" was all Sonya said, instantly turning white. 
Natasha, seeing the impression the news of her brother's wound produced on S6nya, felt for*' the first time the sorrowful side of the news. 
She rushed to S6nya, hugged her, and began to cry. 
"A little wound, but he has been made an officer; he is well now, he wrote himself," said she through her tears. 
"There now! It's true that all you women are crybabies," remarked Pe*tya, pacin
